ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(ucinn_ascendv2__Account_Number_Storage_Method__c, 'Unmasked & Unencrypted') && ucinn_ascendv2__Account_Number_Storage_Mthd_Conf_Phrase__c != 'I confirm Unmasked _&AND&_ Unencrypted ACH / Direct Debit Account Numbers in ascend.'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Number Confirmation must be "I confirm Unmasked _&AND&_ Unencrypted ACH / Direct Debit Account Numbers in ascend." for the selected storage method.
